snippet: HERMELE--Cyril Harold, passed on Wednesday, April 13, 2016, in his 97th year. Ever loving and caring husband of the late Betty, beloved father of Noel and Carole; dearest father-in-law of Karen and Andy, adoring grandfather of Michael, Jay, and Randi, proud great-grandfather of Max and Jackson, devoted and cherished son of the late Hyman and Frances Hermele; loving big brother to Madeline and Lawrence; caring uncle and great-uncle to many nieces, nephews, grandnieces and grand-nephews. Funeral services will be held Sunday, 1pm April 17 at the Riverside Nassau North Chapels, 55 N. Station Plaza Rd., Great Neck, NY. www.riversidenassau northchapel.com 1/3
